KarateInstructorToStudent:It'SOkToCry.name: Karate instructor to student: It's OK to cry
KarateInstructorToStudent:It'SOkToCry.summary: Karate instructor Sharath Jason Williams stopped his class to give an emotional student an inspirational speech that's gone viral.

KarateTestimonial-ProudStudentSharesHisS.name: Karate Testimonial - Proud Student Shares His Story
KarateTestimonial-ProudStudentSharesHisS.summary: Jordan H, a student at Professional Karate Center, shares his experience with Martial Arts while living proactively with Cerebral Palsy.  Jordan's Dream of becoming a martial artist pushed him to pursue this journey and he has worked proudly through our system.

SocalKarateInstructorCombinesMartialArts.name: SoCal karate instructor combines martial arts and therapy for special needs kids
SocalKarateInstructorCombinesMartialArts.summary: An Orange County martial arts program has combined the practice of karate with the knowledge of occupational therapy to help children and teens with special needs thrive.
